questions.question: Which layer of the Earth is the outermost?
questions.answer: Crust

questions.question: Which layer lies just below the crust?
questions.answer: Mantle

questions.question: Which is the hottest layer of the Earth?
questions.answer: Inner core

questions.question: The thickness of the Earth’s crust is about ____.
Which element is mainly found in the Earth’s core?
questions.answer: Iron and Nickel

questions.question: The mantle extends up to a depth of about ____.
Which layer is responsible for tectonic movements?
questions.answer: Mantle

questions.question: Which layer is divided into inner core and outer core?
questions.answer: Core

questions.question: What is the approximate temperature of the Earth’s core?
Which layer is also called the lithosphere?
questions.answer: Crust and upper mantle

questions.question: What are the three main layers of the Earth?
questions.answer: The three main layers are the crust, the mantle and the core.

questions.question: Describe the Earth’s crust.
questions.answer: The crust is the thin outermost layer of the Earth where we live.

questions.question: What is the mantle?
questions.answer: The mantle is the layer below the crust and extends up to about 2900 km.

questions.question: What is the core made of?
questions.answer: The core is mainly made of iron and nickel.

questions.question: Why is the core very hot?
questions.answer: Due to extreme pressure and radioactive heat inside the Earth.
